author: Louise B
title: Never again
text:
I stayed here for one night on a business trip and was put on the first floor. I never slept at all due to the Underground rumbling all night once a minute - the noise was like someone dragging a Supermarket goods container across cobbles all night.
I had a really important meeting the next day and begged the staff to swap my room but all they did was offer me complementary breakfast that was no use as my meeting was over breakfast!
The staff didn't care one iota about the guests and whilst I complained, they constantly spoke to other clients despite my obviously being upset and looking for some help - I've never felt so frustrated in my life!
I haven't even started on the broken table and heater that didn't work - keeping my room to a chilly 16', despite my continually turning it up to the maximum indicated of 24 - of course there is no-one on hand in the evening to see to any problems until the morning
Honestly, this place is more like a hostel than a hotel and I will never stay there again, no matter what!! I'd rather camp.
Do yourself a favour and go somewhere else. If there had been a zero rating I would have given it zero.
